about.name: WORLD POULTRY SCIENCE ASSOCIATION - MACEDONIAN BRANCH

goals.title: Goals of the Association
goals.description: The Association primarily focuses on the concept of economically acceptable and sustainable development and adapted concept for the protection, promotion, and development of poultry science and the poultry industry. The Association will promote all theoretical knowledge and practical experiences that help realize and advance the basic goals and tasks.

points.advancement: Promotion of advancement of knowledge in all aspects of poultry science and the poultry industry
points.congresses: Promotion of World Poultry Congresses, as well as local and regional meetings
points.gatherings: Organizing professional and scientific gatherings through lectures, public appearances, round tables, forums, and other appropriate means
points.informing: Informing the public about the activities of the Association through social networks and other methods
points.projects: Development and implementation of scientific national and international projects in the field of poultry
points.dissemination: Dissemination of knowledge in all branches of the poultry industry and facilitating the exchange of economic activities of the Association through organizing scientific meetings, seminars, and lectures, as well as publishing activities

mission.title: Mission and Vision
mission.visionDeclaration: The vision of the Citizens Association World Poultry Science Association - Macedonian Branch Skopje is:
mission.visionContent: To have a high national and international reputation and trust promoting the concept of one health
mission.missionDeclaration: The mission of the Citizens Association World Poultry Science Association - Macedonian Branch Skopje is:
mission.missionContent: To facilitate the exchange of ideas, projects, and initiatives between science, education, and industry in poultry

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Membership in the association is voluntary.

regular.title: Regular
regular.description: Any individual who is 18 years or older

student.title: Student
student.description: Individuals enrolled in undergraduate, graduate or doctoral studies in the relevant scientific field. Student members do not pay membership fees

honorary.title: Honorary
honorary.description: Individuals who have been selected by the Assembly of the Association for special merits, following a proposal by the President

associate.title: Associate
associate.description: Any legal entity that helps and supports the Association's operations

membership.fee: Members pay membership fees (except student members) by April 30th each year. The amount of the membership fee is determined by the Assembly based on the President's proposal.

partners.title: PARTNERS & RESOURCES
partners.description: The Macedonian Branch of the World Poultry Science Association collaborates with numerous national and international organizations, educational institutions, and industry partners to advance poultry science in North Macedonia and beyond. Below are some of our key partners and resources.

wpsa.name: World's Poultry Science Association
wpsa.description: International organization dedicated to advancing poultry science globally.

europeanFederation.name: European Federation of WPSA Branches
europeanFederation.description: Coordinating body for European WPSA branches.

agenda.name: WPSA_EF_EC_2024_Agenda_new
agenda.description: European Federation of WPSA Branches executive committee agenda document.

mediterraneanNetwork.name: Mediterranean Poultry Network
mediterraneanNetwork.description: Network connecting poultry science professionals across the Mediterranean region.

join.title: Join Us
join.description: We welcome new members who are interested in poultry science and the poultry industry. By joining WPSA Macedonian Branch, you'll gain access to a network of professionals, educational resources, and opportunities to collaborate on research projects.
